Welcome to sensparse’s documentation!¶

senswatch.py:¶

Created on Thu Oct 25 17:58:36 2018

@author: lsxhcb

class senswatch.FrameConv¶

sub class of BaseFrame, get the heart value

class senswatch.FrameDrop¶

sub class of BaseFrame, get the information of irrational data

class senswatch.FrameRaw¶

sub class of BaseFrame, get the ppg and acceleration value

class senswatch.Steam(steam)¶

summary of class here

Attrbutes:
steam: one piece of data.
senswatch.parser(path, mertic='sec')¶

Over all analytic function.

Args:
path: path of the file.
Returns:
raw: a list contains many dicts which contain date,ppg and acceleration values. conv: a list contains many dicts which contain date and heart value. drop: a list contains many dicts which contain the irrational data.

test_senswatch.py:¶

test_senswatch.getDataframe()¶

A test of parsing txt file to DataFrame format

senswatch.parser function: Over all function.

Args:
path: path of the file.
Returns:
raw: a list contains dicts consist of
time: int, Unix timestamp ppg : int, Photoplethysmography values acc1: int, Acceleration in x axis; acc2: int, Acceleration in y axis; acc3: int, Acceleration in z axis;
conv: a list contains dicts consist of
time: int, Unix timestamp; hr : int, Heart rate

drop: a list contains dicts consist of the irrational data.

test_senswatch.tans2sec(timeStamp)¶

change the format of datatime.
